pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fits Piecewise Polynomial with Data-Adaptive Knots in Cox Model // In Cox's proportional hazard model, covariates are modeled as linear function and may not be flexible. This package implements additive trend filtering Cox proportional hazards model as proposed in Jiacheng Wu Daniela Witten (2019) "Flexible and Interpretable Models for Survival Data", Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, DOI:10.1080/10618600.2019.1592758. The fitted functions are piecewise polynomial with adaptively chosen knots.
